text: Myriocoleopsis fluviatilis is a species of liverworts in the Lejeuneaceae family. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitat is rivers. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Myriocoleopsis fluviatilis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Myriocoleopsis fluviatilis
